        right - the right

      • BEDashedBorder

        public BEDashedBorder(java.awt.Color color,
                      int thickness,
                      int step,
                      boolean top,
                      boolean left,
                      boolean bottom,
                      boolean right)
        构造方法.
        参数:
        color - 虚线颜色
        thickness - 线框宽度
        step - 步进
        top - the top
        left - the left
        bottom - the bottom
        right - the right
